snippet: After inflicting enormous damage, the House wins virtually nothing and gives up.
abstract: Editorial holds House Republicans inflicted enormous damage on the economy, harm to nation's reputation and achieved a rock-bottom public approval rating in their futile attempt to defund the health care reform law; warns many in the party remain defiant, despite their defeat in budget fight; urges those who refused to submit to Republican Party's blackmail to remain vigilant.
lead_paragraph: After inflicting enormous damage, the House wins virtually nothing and gives up.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
